attributes.title: THIS ATROCITY OF AN APP!
attributes.review: Honestly I wish I could a 0 star rating!! Here I was sitting on my king sized bed and of course I have a Donald Trump body pillow but anyways here I was wanting to support my orange god and I said oh my there seems to be a Donald Trump app and I was like I need to get this app for some fap material! BUT THE APP HAS SUCH BAD VIBES!!!! IT KILLED MY WHOLE MOOD!!!!! anyways y’all should delete this atrocity of an app! There’s no point to it✨✨❤️

attributes.title: If there was a zero star option I would choose that
attributes.review: This app is so stupid and pointless like no one even needs it. It is so garbage and it is harming the society we don’t even need it. She just completely get rid of this app don’t even think about downloading it and oh you know, just delete it I guess

attributes.title: Terrible Decision
attributes.review: I don’t understand why Trump has to take down tiktok for only America. I think it’s very messed up especially when their are huge creators making millions off of it such as Charli D’Amelio, Chase Hudson, Avani Gregg,Addison Rae, Dixie D’Amelio, and other huge creators. You’re also ruining it for adults who enjoy the app. We won’t go down without a fight trump.

attributes.title: Terrible!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: This took years to download I mean years I don’t have crap wifi I have the best wifi ever and this dude Donald trump almost hit my mom and dad his secret services are terrible they called me something I don’t know if it was a bad word and they are going to remove TikTok which is pointless us parents love TikTok and so do kids so ye this is trash Kanye west 2020

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is terrible, it took forever to download and took up so much storage on my phone. The app then took over so much storage space the last pictures I had of my grandma before she passed did not save and are now deleted. This is a terrible app that should be taken off the app store.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is the worst thing i’ve ever seen. they try to get you to interact with some character called donald trump??? but the character design is HORRIBLE and the things he says are so weird. i thought it would be like animal crossing or something but the graphics were disgusting and, again, the character design is UGLY. i am SAD.

attributes.title: DISGOSTANG
attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever experienced. the minute i downloaded it, my grandma died! then all my cows disappeared. my favorite cow too! then i tried to delete the app and it came back for revenge! my whole family got coronavirus and i had hallucinations for days and trump putting children in cages and being racist and sexist. oh wait, that’s real! HATE THIS APP!

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is probably the most ridiculous thing on the market. Never in one million years would I let my kids download or even look at this app. It took forever to download and it is full of childish remarks and immature material. Next time I am looking for valuable news or credible sources I will use TikTok. Don’t mess with Gen Z.😌✌️

attributes.title: Hot Cheeto 🥵🥵
attributes.review: I wanted to show my love for President Cheeto himself😢 but this dang app wouldn’t let me! It would only stay open for seconds and a time! And followed by that the Cheeto sent his minions to my house. Thankfully I fought them off. They wanted me to give a 5 star rating but I wasn’t ab to do that💅🏽💅🏽 so now I have 4 dead minions on my lawn 😎 boutta head to the White House and fight the Cheeto yall wanna come??

attributes.title: Horrible app🤢🤮🍊🍊🍊
attributes.review:
I went onto the app and all of a sudden a sworm of bees 🐝 burst through my door and started chanting trump 2020, they started to back me into the corner of my room and I can’t believe what happened next. They gave birth to more bees but the bees had trumps face 🤢🤮🤮🤮. I am traumatized from that experience. SoOoOoOoOoOoOo that gets a one star from me. 

   TRUMP 2020🍊✨🧚‍♂️ but on a tombstone 🧚‍♂️✨🍊
